name: Crushball
description:
Smash the rockets with your big ball on a chain!

Swing the ball around with your mouse, but beware, you die if the rockets touch your mouse.

Made for the GMTK 2021 game jam.

{EDIT}
Thanks to the fact that I uploaded the game early, I was able to update the game in correspondence with feedback. Enemies will now spawn on the top as well.
